name: Mr Mynde
description:
The worst wars go on quietly, behind the wall, at the neighbouring desk, right in front of us, in the tram in the opposite seat ...

Eternal fight in your own head
get up in the morning
smile at your neighbour,
drive to work
work
come back
sleep,
repeat ...

Until one day you stand on the edge and you have to look into your dark part, stand face to face with yourself and fight another battle with your own Traumas and Nightmares. But is it worth it ...? Is there what ...? If you have the courage to ask such a question, we can give you the opportunity to find an answer to it. We cordially invite the brave and persistent. Those who are not afraid of their own reflection in the mirror ... maybe they will change their mind!
